```{r, results='asis'}
library(rCharts)
data <- read.csv("wef.csv", sep=";", header=TRUE, encoding = "UTF-8", colClasses=c("numeric","factor", "numeric", "numeric", "numeric"))

plot <- nPlot(Score ~ Country, data = data, type = 'multiBarHorizontalChart', title = 'Ranking WEF top 20 - indeks konkurencyjnoÅ›ci gospodarczej')
plot$xAxis(axisLabel = 'Score')
```
